fields.name: Zayed
fields.description: A pretty chill, curious soul that prefers practice to theory. Always ready to jump into an adventure if it looks interesting enough; not so much otherwise. Probably the one who accidentally turned the time machine on in first place.

fields.name: Xian
fields.description: Fun, active, will dance to just about anything that produces a beat. Has great memory, always a joke at hand, might try to introduce memes in Ancient Greece. Scored gold in a track race once and will take any opportunity to bring that up.

fields.name: Jools
fields.description: A quick-witted kid who wasn’t expecting to embark in a time-warping journey but can’t say no to a challenge. Someone has to keep the rest of the group in check, after all!
